Recipe.Name: Standard dashboard (optional)
Recipe.Description: Install items which clone the standard dashboard items.
Recipe.Author: Ikutsin

Item.Name: Get up and running
Item.Parameters: <Form><displayName>Get up and running</displayName><Body>Start by exploring the menu on the left and familiarize yourself with Orchard. As for the basics, we suggest <a href="/Admin/Themes">changing the theme</a>, <a href="/Admin/Contents/Create/Page">adding some pages</a>, <a href="/Admin/Blogs/Create">setup up a blog</a>, and <a href="/Admin/Settings/Index">configuring basic settings</a>.</Body><technicalName>start</technicalName><__RequestVerificationToken>45HE8gpmFkXU4qEMur2ltUwWS+6TcVsWNeueg60Ta+8yrfKYP2+22ndFyCmohETOk90B84/bFgzow7aqZTD4ztiAO+T+875rx5CFIKzqmgaqp1dbW833XIpHVL4pT86bliAOWl+kXdjbySjh68KTTM/DX6kTovNihyGbrxMiWAwvlesprIbJGkvX+/ytQNY/cv0R4fq3/xmgCbyo/5qjrsp4cGenzRDCw/xVWkw3RUQ=</__RequestVerificationToken><op>Save</op></Form>

Item.Name: Get more goodies
Item.Parameters: <Form><displayName>Get more goodies</displayName><Body>Change the way your site works and looks with <a href="/Packaging/Gallery/Themes">themes</a> and <a href="/Packaging/Gallery/Modules">modules</a>. There’s plenty to choose from in the <a href="http://orchardproject.net/gallery">Orchard Gallery</a>. We’re always adding things, so be sure to check back often to see what’s new.</Body><technicalName>gallery</technicalName><__RequestVerificationToken>Kp7sp0T1JavnE0Q1XFN+bmTWFFxkgOG3p4Umgh3jlhZ320XhOs5+RlAG46hPOqEqsFHSJOpLk/nZ6114Ozd8XW7GvzIT4VU9bZEGUA5CSQ+KdP7mJO1hu2zQnNb1QaFKNirdkDe3qlaPccrt4lXmgDNz23aZf5eRTO0aZvHPGEcOXgMGloyKHObjVqRIZgVVE8O7KLzOOFh3ZpxsaCgI6Av/E1zpBvDiZyS6B5bP+lg=</__RequestVerificationToken><op>Save</op></Form>

Item.Name: Read the Docs
Item.Parameters:
<Form><displayName>Read the Docs</displayName><Body>Are you ready to go deeper and become an Orchard expert? Take a look at the
<a href="http://orchardproject.net/docs/">Orchard Documentation Wiki</a>
to learn about how everything connects together and what makes Orchard tick.</Body><technicalName>docs</technicalName><__RequestVerificationToken>qr67TTltUpze1cuZFd3/ytFE+ZOHUBPNG93lql4VIDlk1EV46TrXwVcQUAdNOyJur2A3mgwLwlxbzYUDMCCaNEgXqgwhn8mYQIOaCbM3fOQPCWPalJO/MpoSPKk0ab0HTM8+nyl7IGSF5kT5cHn34olNPClq98uNaUl698tZdi2zJjbi+YLZIv6xbj+Xao4HZKsFahfCrjnVjv4GNeshgEy3xhwnJ8kVHOs37NiDBPE=</__RequestVerificationToken><op>Save</op></Form>

Item.Name: Make friends
Item.Parameters:
<Form><displayName>Make friends</displayName><Body>Find friends that share your interest of Orchard. There are a couple ways that you can
<a href="http://orchardproject.net/discussions">discuss and get connected</a>
to the project including mailing lists, forums and IRC</Body><technicalName>friends</technicalName><__RequestVerificationToken>wJN2/LNtpH8kqeh2vGinfr9slIL3/kRarrU7vugryWTiq0q7XPwUk5IDxT67jA21jZM4lAUrIpL18qb3bKXCM1eLR0t9wSzf0GZ1ctqT6idyz2FHQ1EWZQbFrKhZmM3OwR1d1vgtziBlkkMBiTX6wUT9sn5jECGSKDkUYe8qdIiaEzTVnt4sdcPOggKJwmuQqXGwtE+bRVqJf1RBE1vHLPpwziox+it6b5Pv+CN1e6U=</__RequestVerificationToken><op>Save</op></Form>

Item.Name: Contribute back
Item.Parameters: <Form><displayName>Contribute back</displayName><Body>Help grow Orchard. We encourage contributions of all sorts, including code submissions, documentation, translations, feature recommendations, and more.Here are some ways to <a href="http://orchardproject.net/contribution">give back to the project</a></Body><technicalName>contribute</technicalName><__RequestVerificationToken>Ppv/pGdVm3Paa8YX4hyzL4rDl4McDCXOe4vR7wrdnkI1jAa9KuGjpQUlbmWygcNhmdw9XUW+//NKAH6PnMNF91vEuiXoOJG7jVhiN7wwPbJUsWZEYgv0mm4d+FHnTJyVuAc3rgcnsLr+Y/XoqIjAQlFsLMTIgci6qUW82EIUssfZg5Z6tllTa7B58AzXfyMoqhTNIYLWEFzWrmgvenRIeabv+ngPv3TGwbjNn8LVzdU=</__RequestVerificationToken><op>Save</op></Form>
